MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG12 postcode area of Annan. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:52pm. Our emergency response team is currently on site carrying out investigations after reports of grounded overhead lines and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will update this message to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8pm on 26th December 2020.
